dcterms:creator: Andreas Geiger
Philip Lenz
Christoph Stiller
Raquel Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is widely utilized in self-supervised monocular depth estimation, known for its stereo image sequences. It provides a challenging benchmark for evaluating depth estimation algorithms.
dcterms:title: KITTI Dataset

dcterms:creator: Marius Cordts
Mohamed Omran
Sebastian Ramos
Timo Rehfeld
Markus Enzweiler
Rodrigo Benenson
Uwe Franke
Stefan Roth
Bernt Schiele
dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset is noted for its complexity and abundance of moving objects, serving as a testing ground to assess the adaptability of depth estimation models.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes Dataset

dcterms:creator: Ashutosh Saxena
Min Sun
Andrew Y Ng
dcterms:description: The Make3D dataset is used to assess the capability of depth estimation models to generalize to new, previously unseen images.
dcterms:title: Make3D Dataset
